testcase.name: Cart button1
testcase.system-out: Given User on home page1....................................................passed Then Click each tab on yellow banner. User should navigate to the Cart page after clicking the Cart icon button1.passed

testcase.name: Changing quantity of product in the Cart2
testcase.system-out: Given Click Tab on Home page to product page2...............................passed When Click the chosen product and click Add to cart button2.................passed And Click Cart Icon button1.................................................passed Then Verify User able to change the quantity of product in the Cart2........passed

testcase.name: Go shopping button3
testcase.system-out: Given Click Cart icon button3...............................................passed When User should be able to see and click Go Shopping button3...............passed Then the cart is empty which navigates to the homepage3.....................passed
